dialogs.save_folder:
SnapEnhance requires Storage permissions to download and Save Media from Snapchat.
Please choose the location where media should be downloaded to.

mappings.generate_failure_no_snapchat: SnapEnhance was unable to detect Snapchat, please try reinstalling Snapchat.
mappings.generate_failure: An error occurred while trying to generate mappings, please try again.
mappings.dialog: To dynamically support a wide range of Snapchat Versions, mappings are necessary for SnapEnhance to function properly, this should not take more than 5 seconds.

permissions.dialog: To continue you need to fit the following requirements:

tasks.remove_selected_tasks_title: Are you sure you want to remove selected tasks?
tasks.remove_all_tasks_title: Are you sure you want to remove all tasks?

home_logs.saving_logs_toast: Saving logs, This may take a while ...

manage_scope.delete_scope_confirm_dialog_title: Are you sure You want to Delete a {scope}?

messaging_preview.bridge_connection_failed: Failed to connect to Snapchat through bridge service

scripting_warning.title: Warning
scripting_warning.content: SnapEnhance includes a scripting tool, allowing the execution of user-defined code on your device. Use extreme caution and only install modules from known, reliable sources. Unauthorised or unverified modules may pose security risks to your system.

reset_config.title: Reset config
reset_config.content: Are you sure you want to reset the config?

auto_download.name: Auto Download
auto_download.description: Automatically download Snaps when viewing them

stealth.description: Prevents anyone from knowing you've opened their Snaps/Chats and conversations
stealth.name: Stealth Mode

auto_save.name: Auto Save
auto_save.description: Saves Chat Messages when viewing them

unsaveable_messages.name: Unsaveable Messages
unsaveable_messages.description: Prevents messages from being saved in chat by other people

auto_open_snaps.name: Automatically Opens Snaps
auto_open_snaps.description: Automatically opens Snaps upon receiving them

export_memories.name: Export Memories
export_memories.description: Exports Memories into a ZIP file

manage_friend_list.name: Manage Friend List
manage_friend_list.description: Import/export your friends list when backing up

export_chat_messages.description: Exports conversation messages into a JSON/HTML/TXT file
export_chat_messages.name: Export Chat Messages

bulk_messaging_action.name: Bulk Messaging Action
bulk_messaging_action.description: Performs operations such as deleting friends or mass deletion of conversations

notices.internal_behavior: ⚠ This may break Snapchat's internal behavior
notices.require_native_hooks: ⚠ This feature requires experimental Native Hooks to work correctly

merge_overlays.name: Merge Overlays
merge_overlays.description: Combines the Text and the media of a Snap into a single file

download_profile_pictures.name: Download Profile Pictures
download_profile_pictures.description: Allows you to download Profile Pictures from the profile page

download_context_menu.description:
Allows you to download/preview messages from a conversation or a story using the context menu.
Long press on buttons will force download
download_context_menu.name: Download Context Menu

threads.name: Threads
threads.description: The amount of threads to use

preset.name: Preset
preset.description: Set the speed of the conversion

constant_rate_factor.name: Constant Rate Factor
constant_rate_factor.description:
Set the constant rate factor for the video encoder
From 0 to 51 for libx264

custom_video_codec.name: Custom Video Codec
custom_video_codec.description: Set a custom Video Codec (e.g. libx264)

custom_audio_codec.name: Custom Audio Codec
custom_audio_codec.description: Set a custom Audio Codec (e.g. AAC)

save_folder.name: Save Folder
save_folder.description: Select the directory to which all media should be downloaded to

auto_download_sources.name: Auto Download Sources
auto_download_sources.description: Select the sources to automatically download from

prevent_self_auto_download.name: Prevent Self Auto Download
prevent_self_auto_download.description: Prevents your own Snaps from being downloaded automatically

allow_duplicate.name: Allow Duplicate
allow_duplicate.description: Allows the same media to be downloaded multiple times

force_voice_note_format.name: Force Voice Note Format
force_voice_note_format.description: Forces Voice Notes to be saved in a specified Format

opera_download_button.name: Opera Download Button
opera_download_button.description:
Adds a download button on the top right corner when viewing a Snap.
Long press on buttons will force download

force_image_format.name: Force Image Format
force_image_format.description: Forces images to be saved in a specified Format

logging.name: Logging
logging.description: Shows toasts when media is downloading

custom_path_format.name: Custom Path Format
custom_path_format.description:
Specify a custom path format for downloaded media

Available variables:
 - %username%
 - %source%
 - %hash%
 - %date_time%

amount.description: The amount of messages to get previewed
amount.name: Amount

friend_feed_message_preview.description: Shows a preview of the last messages in the Friend Feed
friend_feed_message_preview.name: Friend Feed Message Preview

snap_preview.name: Snap Preview
snap_preview.description: Displays a small preview next to unseen Snaps in chat

home_tab.name: Home Tab
home_tab.description: Overrides the startup tab when opening Snapchat

streak_expiration_info.name: Show Streak Expiration Info
streak_expiration_info.description: Shows a Streak Expiration timer next to the Streaks counter

map_friend_nametags.name: Enhanced Friend Map Nametags
map_friend_nametags.description: Improves the Nametags of friends on the Snapmap

prevent_message_list_auto_scroll.name: Prevent Message List Auto Scroll
prevent_message_list_auto_scroll.description: Prevents the message list from scrolling to the bottom when sending/receiving a message

opera_media_quick_info.name: Opera Media Quick Info
opera_media_quick_info.description: Shows useful information of media such as creation date in opera viewer context menu

vertical_story_viewer.description: Enables the vertical story viewer for all stories
vertical_story_viewer.name: Vertical Story Viewer

friend_feed_menu_buttons.name: Friend Feed Menu Buttons
friend_feed_menu_buttons.description: Select which buttons to show in the Friend Feed Menu

message_indicators.name: Message Indicators
message_indicators.description:
Adds specific indicators icons to messages
Note: indicators might not be 100% accurate

stealth_mode_indicator.name: Stealth Mode Indicator
stealth_mode_indicator.description: Adds a 👻 emoji next to conversations in Stealth Mode

enable_app_appearance.name: Enable App Appearance Settings
enable_app_appearance.description:
Enables the hidden App Appearance Setting
May not be required on newer Snapchat versions

amoled_dark_mode.name: AMOLED Dark Mode
amoled_dark_mode.description:
Enables AMOLED dark mode
Make sure Snapchat's Dark mode is enabled

hide_friend_feed_entry.name: Hide Friend Feed Entry
hide_friend_feed_entry.description:
Hides a specific friend from the Friend Feed
Use the social tab to manage this feature

hide_streak_restore.description: Hides the Restore button in the friend feed
hide_streak_restore.name: Hide Streak Restore

hide_quick_add_friend_feed.name: Hide Quick Add in Friend Feed
hide_quick_add_friend_feed.description: Hides the Quick Add section in the friend feed

hide_story_suggestions.name: Hide Story Suggestions
hide_story_suggestions.description: Removes suggestions from the Stories page

hide_ui_components.description: Select which UI components to hide
hide_ui_components.name: Hide UI Components

old_bitmoji_selfie.name: Old Bitmoji Selfie
old_bitmoji_selfie.description: Brings back the Bitmoji selfies from older Snapchat versions

hide_settings_gear.name: Hide Settings Gear
hide_settings_gear.description: Hides the SnapEnhance Settings Gear in The friend feed

enable_friend_feed_menu_bar.name: Friend Feed Menu Bar
enable_friend_feed_menu_bar.description: Enables the new Friend Feed Menu Bar

user_interface.name: User Interface
user_interface.description: Change the look and feel of Snapchat

messaging.name: Messaging

bypass_screenshot_detection.description: Prevents Snapchat from detecting when you take a screenshot
bypass_screenshot_detection.name: Bypass Screenshot Detection

anonymous_story_viewing.name: Anonymous Story Viewing
anonymous_story_viewing.description: Prevents anyone from knowing you've seen their story

hide_peek_a_peek.description: Prevents notification from being sent when you half swipe into a chat
hide_peek_a_peek.name: Hide Peek-a-Peek

prevent_story_rewatch_indicator.description: Prevents anyone from knowing you've rewatched their story
prevent_story_rewatch_indicator.name: Prevent Story Rewatch Indicator

hide_bitmoji_presence.name: Hide Bitmoji Presence
hide_bitmoji_presence.description: Prevents your Bitmoji from popping up while in Chat

hide_typing_notifications.name: Hide Typing Notifications
hide_typing_notifications.description: Prevents anyone from knowing you're typing a message

half_swipe_notifier.name: Half Swipe Notifier
half_swipe_notifier.description: Notifies you when someone half swipes into a conversation

min_duration.name: Minimum Duration
min_duration.description: The minimum duration of the half swipe (in seconds)

max_duration.name: Maximum Duration
max_duration.description: The maximum duration of the half swipe (in seconds)

disable_replay_in_ff.name: Disable Replay in FF
disable_replay_in_ff.description: Disables the ability to replay with a long press from the Friend Feed

message_preview_length.name: Message Preview Length
message_preview_length.description: Specify the amount of messages to get previewed

call_start_confirmation.name: Call Start Confirmation
call_start_confirmation.description: Shows a confirmation dialog when starting a call

auto_save_messages_in_conversations.name: Auto Save Messages
auto_save_messages_in_conversations.description: Automatically saves every message in conversations

remove_groups_locked_status.name: Remove Groups Locked Status
remove_groups_locked_status.description: Allows you to view group information after being kicked

unlimited_snap_view_time.name: Unlimited Snap View Time
unlimited_snap_view_time.description: Removes the Time Limit for viewing Snaps

loop_media_playback.name: Loop Media Playback
loop_media_playback.description: Loops media playback when viewing Snaps / Stories

prevent_message_sending.name: Prevent Message Sending
prevent_message_sending.description: Prevents sending certain types of messages

better_notifications.name: Better Notifications
better_notifications.description: Adds more information in received notifications

notification_blacklist.name: Notification Blacklist
notification_blacklist.description: Select notifications which should get blocked

auto_purge.name: Auto Purge
auto_purge.description: Automatically deletes cached messages that are older than the specified amount of time

message_filter.name: Message Filter
message_filter.description: Select which messages should get logged (empty for all messages)

keep_my_own_messages.name: Keep My Own Messages
keep_my_own_messages.description: Prevents your own messages from being deleted

gallery_media_send_override.name: Gallery Media Send Override
gallery_media_send_override.description: Spoofs the media source when sending from the Gallery

strip_media_metadata.name: Strip Media Metadata
strip_media_metadata.description: Removes metadata of media before sending as a message

bypass_message_retention_policy.name: Bypass Message Retention Policy
bypass_message_retention_policy.description: Prevents messages from being deleted after viewing them

bypass_message_action_restrictions.name: Bypass Message Action Restrictions
bypass_message_action_restrictions.description: Allows you to react to a snap without having opened it or to save an unsaveable message

auto_mark_as_read.name: Automatically Marks as Read
auto_mark_as_read.description: Automatically marks messages/snaps as read even when Stealth Mode is enabled

friend_mutation_notifier.description: Notifies you when something changes on a friend's profile
friend_mutation_notifier.name: Friend Mutation Notifier

messaging.description: Change how you interact with friends

spoof_location.name: Spoof Location
spoof_location.description: Spoofs your location to a specified one

coordinates.name: Coordinates
coordinates.description: Set the coordinates of the spoofed location

always_update_location.name: Always Update Location
always_update_location.description: Force Snapchat to update location even if no GPS data is received

suspend_location_updates.description: Adds a button in map settings to suspend location updates
suspend_location_updates.name: Suspend Location Updates

spoof_battery_level.description:
Spoofs the battery level of your device on map
Value must be between 0 and 100
spoof_battery_level.name: Spoof Battery Level

spoof_headphones.name: Spoof Headphones
spoof_headphones.description: Spoofs the status of listening to music on map

disable_metrics.name: Disable Metrics
disable_metrics.description: Blocks sending specific analytic data to Snapchat

spotlight_comments_username.description: Shows author username in Spotlight comments
spotlight_comments_username.name: Spotlight Comments Username

bypass_video_length_restriction.name: Bypass Video Length Restrictions
bypass_video_length_restriction.description:
Single: sends a single video
Split: split videos after editing

force_upload_source_quality.name: Force Upload Source Quality
force_upload_source_quality.description:
Forces Snapchat to upload media in the original quality
Please note that this may not remove metadata from media

default_volume_controls.name: Default Volume Controls
default_volume_controls.description: Forces Snapchat to use system volume controls

snapchat_plus.description:
Enables Snapchat Plus features
Some Server-sided features may not work
snapchat_plus.name: Snapchat Plus

disable_story_sections.name: Disable Story Sections
disable_story_sections.description:
Removes sections from the Stories page
May require a refresh to work properly

disable_permission_requests.name: Disable Permission Requests
disable_permission_requests.description: Prevents Snapchat from asking for specific permissions

disable_memories_snap_feed.name: Disable Memories Snap Feed
disable_memories_snap_feed.description: Prevents Snapchat from showing recent memories when you swipe up in camera

default_video_playback_rate.name: Default Video Playback Rate
default_video_playback_rate.description:
Sets the default speed for the playback of videos
Value must be between 0.1 and 4.0

video_playback_rate_slider.name: Video Playback Rate Slider
video_playback_rate_slider.description:
Adds a slider in opera context menu to change the video playback rate
Note: Changes only apply to subsequent videos

disable_snap_splitting.name: Disable Snap Splitting
disable_snap_splitting.description:
Prevents Snaps from being split into multiple parts
Pictures you send will turn into videos

disable_google_play_dialogs.name: Disable Google Play Services Dialogs
disable_google_play_dialogs.description: Prevent Google Play Services availability dialogs from being shown

hide_active_music.name: Hide Active Music
hide_active_music.description:
Prevents Snapchat from knowing you're listening to music
This will allow you to take snaps using control volume buttons while listening to music

disable_custom_tabs.name: Disable Custom Tabs
disable_custom_tabs.description: Opens links in supported applications rather than in the Web Browser

camera.name: Camera
camera.description: Adjust the right settings for the perfect snap

immersive_camera_preview.description:
Prevents Snapchat from Cropping the Camera preview
This might cause the camera to flicker on some devices
immersive_camera_preview.name: Immersive Preview

override_front_resolution.name: Override Front Resolution
override_front_resolution.description: Overrides the camera resolution for the front camera

disable_cameras.name: Disable Cameras
disable_cameras.description: Prevents Snapchat from using the selected cameras

black_photos.name: Black Photos
black_photos.description:
Replaces captured photos with a black background
Videos are not affected

override_back_resolution.description: Overrides the camera resolution for the back camera
override_back_resolution.name: Override Back Resolution

custom_resolution.description:
Sets a custom camera resolution, width x height (e.g. 1920x1080).
The custom resolution must be supported by your device
custom_resolution.name: Custom Resolution

front_custom_frame_rate.name: Front Custom Frame Rate
front_custom_frame_rate.description: Overrides the front camera frame rate

back_custom_frame_rate.name: Back Custom Frame Rate
back_custom_frame_rate.description: Overrides the back camera frame rate

hevc_recording.name: HEVC Recording
hevc_recording.description: Uses HEVC (H.265) codec for video recording

group_notifications.description: Group notifications into a single one
group_notifications.name: Group Notifications

remaining_hours.name: Remaining Time
remaining_hours.description: The remaining amount of time before the notification is shown (hours)

streaks_reminder.name: Streaks Reminder
streaks_reminder.description: Periodically notifies you about your Streaks

native_hooks.name: Native Hooks
native_hooks.description: Unsafe Features that hook into Snapchat's native code

composer_console.name: Composer Console
composer_console.description: Allows you to execute JavaScript code in Composer (arm64 only)

bypass_camera_roll_limit.name: Bypass Camera Roll Limit
bypass_camera_roll_limit.description: Increases the maximum amount of media you can send from the camera roll

composer_logs.name: Composer Logs
composer_logs.description: Redirects console logs of Composer to SnapEnhance

show_first_created_username.description: Shows the first created username next to the current username in the profile page
show_first_created_username.name: Show First Created Username

composer_hooks.name: Composer Hooks
composer_hooks.description: Injects code into the Composer cross-platform UI framework

remove_mock_location_flag.name: Remove Mock Location Flag
remove_mock_location_flag.description: Prevents Snapchat from detecting Mock location

play_store_installer_package_name.name: Play Store Installer Package Name
play_store_installer_package_name.description: Overrides the installer package name to com.android.vending

android_id.name: Android ID
android_id.description: Spoofs your Android ID to the specified value

randomize_persistent_device_token.name: Randomize Persistent Device Token
randomize_persistent_device_token.description: Generates a random device token after each login

media_file_picker.name: Media File Picker
media_file_picker.description: Allows you to pick any video/audio file from the gallery

story_logger.name: Story Logger
story_logger.description: Provides a history of friends stories

account_switcher.name: Account Switcher
account_switcher.description:
Allows you to switch between accounts without logging out
Long press on the search icon next to your Bitmoji profile to open the menu
Note: this feature is experimental and will likely change in the future

auto_backup_current_account.description: Automatically backs up the current account when logging out or switching accounts
auto_backup_current_account.name: Auto Backup Current Account

capture_duplex_events.name: Capture Duplex Events
capture_duplex_events.description: Capture presence and messaging events when a session is active

allow_running_in_background.name: Allow Running in Background
allow_running_in_background.description: Allows session to run in the background

convert_message_locally.name: Convert Message Locally
convert_message_locally.description: Converts snaps to chat external media locally. This appears in chat download context menu

new_chat_action_menu.name: New Chat Action Menu
new_chat_action_menu.description: Use the new chat action menu drawer

edit_message.name: Edit Messages
edit_message.description: Allows you to edit messages in conversations

infinite_story_boost.description: Bypass the Story Boost Limit delay
infinite_story_boost.name: Infinite Story Boost

meo_passcode_bypass.description:
Bypass the My Eyes Only passcode
This will only work if the passcode has been entered correctly before
meo_passcode_bypass.name: My Eyes Only Passcode Bypass

no_friend_score_delay.name: No Friend Score Delay
no_friend_score_delay.description: Removes the delay when viewing a Friends Score

e2ee.name: End-To-End Encryption
e2ee.description:
Encrypts your messages with AES using a shared secret key
Make sure to save your key somewhere safe!

encrypted_message_indicator.name: Encrypted Message Indicator
encrypted_message_indicator.description: Adds a 🔒 emoji next to encrypted messages

force_message_encryption.name: Force Message Encryption
force_message_encryption.description: Prevents sending encrypted messages to people who don't have E2E Encryption enabled only when multiple conversations are selected

add_friend_source_spoof.description: Spoofs the source of a Friend Request
add_friend_source_spoof.name: Add Friend Source Spoof

hidden_snapchat_plus_features.description:
Enables unreleased/beta Snapchat Plus features
Might not work on older Snapchat versions
hidden_snapchat_plus_features.name: Hidden Snapchat Plus Features

prevent_forced_logout.name: Prevent Forced Logout
prevent_forced_logout.description: Prevents Snapchat from logging you out when you login on another device

app_lock.name: App Lock
app_lock.description: Prevents access to Snapchat without a passcode

lock_on_resume.name: Lock On Resume
lock_on_resume.description: Locks the app when it's reopened

custom_streaks_expiration_format.name: Bespoke Streak Expiry Format
custom_streaks_expiration_format.description:
Customises the Streaks Expiry format

Available variables:
- %c: Streaks Count
- %e: Hourglass Emoji
- %d: Days
- %h: Hours
- %m: Minutes
- %s: Seconds
- %w: Remaining Time

rules.name: Rules
rules.description: Manage Automatic Features for individual people

scripting.name: Scripting
scripting.description: Run custom scripts to extend SnapEnhance

developer_mode.name: Developer Mode
developer_mode.description: Shows debug info on Snapchat's UI

module_folder.name: Module Folder
module_folder.description: The folder where the scripts are located

integrated_ui.name: Integrated UI
integrated_ui.description: Allows scripts to add custom UI components to Snapchat

auto_reload.name: Auto Reload
auto_reload.description: Automatically reloads scripts when they change

better_notifications.mark_as_read_and_save_in_chat: Save in Chat when marking as read (depends on Auto Save)

path_format.append_username: Add the username to the file name
path_format.append_date_time: Add the date and time to the file name
path_format.create_source_folder: Create folder for each media source type
path_format.append_source: Add the media source to the file name
path_format.append_hash: Add a unique hash to the file name

message_indicators.encryption_indicator: Adds a 🔒 icon next to messages that have been sent only to you
message_indicators.location_indicator: Adds a 📍 icon to snaps when they have been sent with location enabled
message_indicators.platform_indicator: Adds the platform icon from which a media was sent (e.g. Android, iOS, Web)
message_indicators.ovf_editor_indicator: Indicates if a snap has been sent using OVF Editor
message_indicators.director_mode_indicator: Adds a ✏️ icon to snaps when they have been sent using Director Mode, which can be used to send gallery images as snaps

auto_mark_as_read.conversation_read: Mark conversation as read upon sending a message
auto_mark_as_read.snap_reply: Mark snaps as read when replying to them

friend_mutation_notifier.remove_friend: Notify when someone removes you as a friend
friend_mutation_notifier.birthday_changes: Notify when someone changes their birthday
friend_mutation_notifier.bitmoji_selfie_changes: Notify when someone changes their Bitmoji selfie
friend_mutation_notifier.bitmoji_scene_changes: Notify when someone changes their Bitmoji scene
friend_mutation_notifier.bitmoji_avatar_changes: Notify when someone changes their Bitmoji avatar
friend_mutation_notifier.bitmoji_background_changes: Notify when someone changes their Bitmoji background

better_notifications.stealth_mode_notice: Can't mark as read in stealth mode

call_start_confirmation.dialog_message: Are you sure you want to start a call?

streaks_reminder.notification_text: You will lose your Streak with {friend} in {hoursLeft} hours

gallery_media_send_override.multiple_media_toast: You can only send one media at a time

confirmation_dialog.title: Are you sure?
confirmation_dialog.message: This will affect all selected friends. This action cannot be undone.

exporter_dialog.amount_of_messages_title: Amount of Messages (leave it blank for all)

chat_export.finished: Done! You Can Now Close This Dialog.

half_swipe_notifier.notification_content_dm: {friend} Just Half-Swiped Into Your Chat For {duration} Seconds

confirmation_dialogs.title: End-to-end encryption
confirmation_dialogs.confirmation_1: WARNING: This will overwrite your existing key. You will loose access to all encrypted messages from this friend. Are you sure you want to continue?
confirmation_dialogs.confirmation_2: Are you REALLY sure you want to continue? This is your last chance to back out.

toolbox.no_shared_key: You don't have a shared secret with this friend yet. Click below to initiate a new one.

end_to_end_encryption.unencrypted_conversation_send_failure_to: You can't send encrypted content to both encrypted and unencrypted conversations!
end_to_end_encryption.native_hooks_send_failure_toast: Failed to send! Please enable Native Hooks in the settings.
end_to_end_encryption.no_participants_to_encrypt_toast: You don't have any friends in this conversation to encrypt messages with!
end_to_end_encryption.encryption_failed_toast: Failed to encrypt message! Check logcat for more details.
end_to_end_encryption.accept_secret_key_success_toast: Done! You can now send and receive encrypted messages with this friend.
end_to_end_encryption.incoming_pk_message: You just received a public key request. Click below to accept it.
end_to_end_encryption.incoming_secret_message: Your friend just accepted your public key. Click below to accept the secret.

friend_mutation_observer.friend_removed: {username} has removed you as a friend
friend_mutation_observer.birthday_changed: {username} has changed their birthday from {oldBirthday} to {newBirthday}
